<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin"></a>

# GridMapEditorPlugin

**Inherits:** [EditorPlugin](class_editorplugin.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Editor for [GridMap](class_gridmap.md) nodes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

GridMapEditorPlugin provides access to the [GridMap](class_gridmap.md) editor functionality.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_clear_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_selection**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_clear_selection)

Deselects any currently selected cells.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_current_grid_map"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[GridMap](class_gridmap.md) **get_current_grid_map**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_current_grid_map)

Returns the [GridMap](class_gridmap.md) node currently edited by the grid map editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_cells"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md) **get_selected_cells**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_cells)

Returns an array of [Vector3i](class_vector3i.md)\ s with the selected cells' coordinates.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_palette_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_selected_palette_item**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selected_palette_item)

Returns the index of the selected [MeshLibrary](class_meshlibrary.md) item in the grid map editor's palette or ``-1`` if no item is selected.

\ **Note:** The indices might not be in the same order as they appear in the editor's interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AABB](class_aabb.md) **get_selection**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_get_selection)

Returns the cell coordinate bounds of the current selection. Use [has_selection()](class_gridmapeditorplugin.md#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_has_selection) to check if there is an active selection.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_has_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **has_selection**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_has_selection)

Returns ``true`` if there are selected cells.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selected_palette_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_selected_palette_item**\ (\ item\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selected_palette_item)

Selects the [MeshLibrary](class_meshlibrary.md) item with the given index in the grid map editor's palette. If a negative index is given, no item will be selected. If a value greater than the last index is given, the last item will be selected.

\ **Note:** The indices might not be in the same order as they appear in the editor's interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_selection**\ (\ begin\: [Vector3i](class_vector3i.md), end\: [Vector3i](class_vector3i.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GridMapEditorPlugin_method_set_selection)

Selects the cells inside the given bounds from `begin` to `end`.
